thread.title: Police ID clown-dressed man accused of wielding ax
thread.title_full: Police ID clown-dressed man accused of wielding ax | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: palmbeachpost
title: Police ID clown-dressed man accused of wielding ax
text:
Police in Hickory, North Carolina, have identified a man accused of swinging an ax at a woman while wearing a clown costume.
An arrest warrant has been obtained for 31-year-old Jimmy Raybon of Connelly Springs on a charge of assault with a deadly weapon.
Eyewitness News Hickory police spokeswoman Chrystal Dieter said the man came to the woman's Hickory house around 4:30 a.m. Friday wearing a clown mask and a multicolored wig.
Authorities say the man didn't hurt the woman, and she was able to remove his mask and recognized him as an acquaintance before he left.
A motive for the attack was not immediately clear.
